bug.author: vfdev-5
bug.summary: GitHub CI on Windows is broken.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug description</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/pull/1425/checks?check_run_id=1335601277#step:6:39>https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/pull/1425/checks?check_run_id=1335601277#step:6:39</denchmark-link>
Normally, we should skip distributed tests on windows with SKIP_DISTRIB_TESTS=1 CI_PYTHON_VERSION="3.7" sh tests/run_cpu_tests.sh but a distributed test was executed: <denchmark-code>tests/ignite/contrib/engines/test_common.py::test_distrib_cpu ERROR [ 2%] </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Related to beta support of distibuted on windows in pytorch 1.7 <denchmark-link:https://pytorch.org/docs/master/distributed.html#backends-that-come-with-pytorch>https://pytorch.org/docs/master/distributed.html#backends-that-come-with-pytorch</denchmark-link>
